It's not my department.

It's Tom Lehrer.

It's Tom Lehrer.
You ninja'd me...

Anyways, I love that song.

Right, so, back to the OP...

Funny. If I may make a suggestion though: Slice the comic image into its panels, then put those slices on the page. It'd make for much greater support for any mobile device that uses element diamensions to determine zoom. (iPhone in particular...I do wonder sometimes why webcomics of all things dont tend to do this.)
